Features.Tilling.SpeedMultiplier.Descrip: Change the speed at which the player tills farmland with a hoe. Acts as a direct multiplier. Min: 0.1, Max: 2.0, Default: 1.0.
Provides an easier way for players to till farmland, with a hoe.
Features.Tilling.ModMenu.lblSpeedMultipl: The multiplier to apply to the speed of Tilling with a hoe
